trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the header of each column.
trans-unit.target: 当启用排序时通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制转移到`true`，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件呈现的每个列的标头中。

trans-unit.source: These links allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接可用于排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>的所选列的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event to sort a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>事件进行排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。
